trans-unit.source: Construction Works Processing is an add-on to cc|project which provides process support to Construction Works Industries through the management of Construction Projects from the sales process to the invoicing process.

seg-source.mrk: Construction Works Processing is an add-on to cc|project which provides process support to Construction Works Industries through the management of Construction Projects from the sales process to the invoicing process.

trans-unit.source: The BoQ Manager provides the ability to transfer GAEB files electronically between companies for the purpose of bidding on and awarding construction projects based on a standard process. GAEB – or Gemeinsamer Ausschuss fuer Elektronik im Bauwesen, which can be translated as “Joint Committee on Electronics in Construction” – is a German organization that defines the standards in electronic data exchange for construction works industries (refer to http://www.gaeb.de/en/ for more information).

seg-source.mrk: The BoQ Manager provides the ability to transfer GAEB files electronically between companies for the purpose of bidding on and awarding construction projects based on a standard process.

GAEB – or Gemeinsamer Ausschuss fuer Elektronik im Bauwesen, which can be translated as “Joint Committee on Electronics in Construction” – is a German organization that defines the standards in electronic data exchange for construction works industries (refer to http://www.gaeb.de/en/ for more information).

trans-unit.source: In cc|project, Construction Works Processing supports the import/export of the GAEB 90, GAEB 2000 and GAEB XML files to/from Microsoft Dynamics NAV. The GAEB files are the basis of the Calculation specifications.

seg-source.mrk: In cc|project, Construction Works Processing supports the import/export of the GAEB 90, GAEB 2000 and GAEB XML files to/from Microsoft Dynamics NAV.
The GAEB files are the basis of the Calculation specifications.

trans-unit.source: Construction Works Processing uses the GAEB Konverter from T&T Datentechnik GmbH to convert the above formats into a special XML format (TML) that can be processed by Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Construction Works Processing uses the GAEB Konverter from T&T Datentechnik GmbH to convert the above formats into a special XML format (TML) that can be processed by Microsoft Dynamics NAV.
